rewritten.rewritten_sql:
SELECT "mall_goods_sku_id" AS "mallGoodsSkuId", "sku_id" AS "skuId", "sku_code" AS "skuCode", "sku_name" AS "skuName", "spu_id" AS "spuId", "spu_code" AS "spuCode", "mall_goods_sku_property" AS "mallGoodsSkuProperty", "mall_goods_sku_picture" AS "mallGoodsSkuPicture", "mall_id" AS "mallId", "mall_goods_id" AS "mallGoodsId", "mall_goods_sku_price_effective_time" AS "mallGoodsSkuPriceEffectiveTime", "mall_goods_sku_sale_price" AS "mallGoodsSkuSalePrice", "mall_goods_sku_market_price" AS "mallGoodsSkuMarketPrice", "mall_goods_sku_type" AS "mallGoodsSkuType", "mobile_code" AS "mobileCode", "mall_member_points_status" AS "mallMemberPointsStatus", "mall_member_rebate_status" AS "mallMemberRebateStatus"
FROM "mall_goods_sku"
WHERE "mall_id" = '27310000000000000000' AND "sku_id" IN ('100005550235', '100008184380', '100018431918', '863f94231ad34580b0ad99fb8c2c612f', 'a49beea870a54a8ab493972cb8243b4f')
rewritten.origin_sql: SELECT     mall_goods_sku_id AS mallGoodsSkuId ,     sku_id AS skuId,     sku_code AS skuCode,     sku_name AS skuName,     spu_id AS spuId,     spu_code AS spuCode,     mall_goods_sku_property AS mallGoodsSkuProperty,     mall_goods_sku_picture AS mallGoodsSkuPicture,     mall_id AS mallId,     mall_goods_id AS mallGoodsId,     mall_goods_sku_price_effective_time AS mallGoodsSkuPriceEffectiveTime,     mall_goods_sku_sale_price AS mallGoodsSkuSalePrice,     mall_goods_sku_market_price AS mallGoodsSkuMarketPrice,     mall_goods_sku_type AS mallGoodsSkuType,     mobile_code AS mobileCode,     mall_member_points_status AS mallMemberPointsStatus,     mall_member_rebate_status AS mallMemberRebateStatus     FROM     mall_goods_sku          WHERE mall_id = '27310000000000000000'                            and sku_id IN (                   null         ,           '100018431918'         ,           '863f94231ad34580b0ad99fb8c2c612f'         ,           'a49beea870a54a8ab493972cb8243b4f'         ,           '100005550235'         ,           '100008184380'                 )
